bham.leakiest

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • bham.leakiest.Channel

  • public class Channel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an information theoretic channel.
    Version:
    1.4.4
    Author:
    Tom Chothia, Yusuke Kawamoto, Chris Novakovic
